meanings.sent1: I had to ungum my shoe from the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ungummed the paper from her fingers.
meanings.sent3: The janitor had to ungum the classroom floor after the prank.
meanings.sent4: He ungummed the situation by offering a solution.
meanings.sent5: The task of ungumming the old posters was tedious but satisfying.

meanings.sent1: The unopened envelope felt ungunm to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The new tablecloth was smooth and ungunm.
meanings.sent3: The ungunm candy wrapper was easily opened.
meanings.sent4: Her ungunm hands were perfect for delicate tasks.
